metaDescription: Semua Transaksi Dekat Ⓝ dikonfirmasi di Near Blockchain. Daftar ini terdiri dari transaksi dari pengiriman Near Ⓝ dan rincian transaksi untuk setiap transaksi.
heading: Transaksi

txn.metaDescription: Near Ⓝ  Blockchain detailed info for transaction {{txn}}.
txn.heading: Transaction Details

hash.tooltip: A Txn Hash or transaction hash is a unique 66 characters identifier that is generated whenever a transaction is executed.

block.tooltip: The number of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

timestamp.tooltip: The date and time at which a transaction is mined.

value.tooltip: The value being transacted in Ⓝ and fiat value

price.tooltip: Closing price of Ⓝ on date of transaction

from.tooltip: The sending party of the transaction.

to.tooltip: The receiving party of the transaction.
